citation: Sen., C-SPAN. “C-SPAN: Sen. Barack Obama’s Full Speech to the DNC.” YouTube, 29 Aug. 2008, youtu.be/ato7BtisXzE?si=r06R2K739PAfMUyC. Accessed 15 Nov. 2024.
label: C-Span: Sen. Barack Obama's Full Speech to the DNC

description.text: Objective Statement: The objective of this project is to conduct a comprehensive analysis of the rhetorical strategies, actions, and language used by then-Senator Barack Obama and other speakers at the 2008 Democratic National Convention during Obama’s presidential nomination acceptance speech. This analysis will focus on identifying key literary devices, audience reactions, and thematic elements, with the aim of drawing connections between the audio content and the eventual election outcomes.
